row.text: Episcopo Bathoniensi scribit, „subdiaconos nulli nisi Romano pontifici li- cere in dominicis diebus ordinare, quamvis consecrandi Deo dicatas virgines et mi- nores ordines his diebus habeant licentiam celebrandi“; cet. App. conc. Lat. XXVI. 23, Coll. Lips. XVIII. 1, Coll. Cass. XXIX. 1, Coll. Bamb. XIX. 1, Comp. I. L. 1. t. 6. c. 1, Decr. Greg. L. I. t. 11. c. 1. — „Subdiaconos autem“.
